html:
Experience Letter

Date: {{ frappe.utils.today() }}

To whomsoever it may concern,

This is to certify that {{ doc.employee_name }} (Employee ID: {{ doc.name }}) was employed with {{ doc.company }} from {{ doc.date_of_joining }} to {{ doc.relieving_date or frappe.utils.today() }} as {{ doc.designation }}.

We appreciate the contributions of {{ doc.employee_name }} during their tenure and wish them success in future endeavors.

Sincerely,
HR Department
name: Experience Letter

html:
{{ doc.company }}

Pay Slip for {{ frappe.format(doc.start_date, {'fieldtype': 'Date'}) }} - {{ frappe.format(doc.end_date, {'fieldtype': 'Date'}) }}

Employee: {{ doc.employee_name }} ({{ doc.employee }})
Department: {{ doc.department or '' }}
Designation: {{ doc.designation or '' }}

name: Custom Payroll Slip
